desc: Meet Apothékary, the creators of the plant-based farmacy. We prefer plants over pills, and we think you will too. Our goal is to keep toxins out, not bring them in, and we believe that through our plant-based medicine we have the ability to unite the mind and body. Free shipping over $45 across US and $129 globally.

layout.text: Backed by over 5,000 years of science, our farmacy offers natural herbal medicine to support optimal mental & physical health.
